summary: An insight on the gritty life of a bored male, Chelsea football hooligan who lives for violence, sex, drugs & alcohol.
cast: Danny Dyer|Frank Harper|Tamer Hassan|Roland Manookian|Neil Maskell|Dudley Sutton|Jamie Foreman|Tony Denham|Calum MacNab|John Junkin|Sophie Linfield|Kara Tointon|Michele Hallak|Daniel Naylor|Alison Egan|Adam Bolton|Philip Dunbar|Ronnie Large|Harry Lynch|Andrew Routledge|Terry McKenna|Darren Wilson|Joe McCorry|Reggie Bisset|Clare McNamara|Christopher Ravenscroft|Lin Blakley|Danny Rees|Simon Weir|Diana Van Proosdy|Ricky Eastop|Jack Mason|Alfie Southion|Dan Mead|Ricci McLeod|Sonny France|Joe Lineham|Louise Liddiard|Zoe Knight|Greg Donaldson|Luke Healy|Avtar Kaul|Anil Lal|Tom Young|Tessa Worsley|Paul Pariser|Luing Andrews|Jayne Levy|Samantha Love|Stephen Alderman|Dan Pozzetti|Clive Stace|Justin Greene|Roberta Thompson|Ravinder Kang|Bobby Parashar|Chandelee Mandakini|Murray Clark|Robin Sneller|Danny Baker|Marcus Kelly|Pete Stevens|Mark O'Donnell|Peter Osgood|Alan Hudson|Tony Cook|Belize Hassan|Belle Hassan|Philip Howard|Darren Luckin|Marley Moore|Andy Parfitt|Karl Churchill|Big Greg Essex|Steven Lawson|Dave Wiltshire
title: Football Factory: diario de un hooligan
